hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa’eed bin Khalid bin Abu Tuwail said:I heard Anas bin Malik saying: I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: “Standing guard one night in the cause of Allah is better than a man fasting and praying, among his family, for a thousand years. The year is three hundred and sixty days and a day is like a thousand years.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الْحَرْسِ وَالتَّكْبِيرِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of guarding the frontiers and saying the Takbir in the cause of Allah
